ComicInfo.Summary:
KISS and the teenage runaways battle their way out of New York to continue their quest to save humanity from the zombie horde, fighting off their undead attackers with a little bit of rock'n'roll and a whole lotta style!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Arthur Suydam | 1 | B | Cover B | Stuart Sayger | 2 | C | Cover C | Rodney Buchemi (a) & Dijjo Lima (c) | 3 | D | Cover D | Photo | 4 | E/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Virgin" Photo Edition Variant Cover | Photo | 5 | F/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Virgin" Art Edition Variant Cover | Rodney Buchemi (a) & Dijjo Lima (c) | 6 | G/RI | 1:30 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Art Edition Variant Cover | Rodney Buchemi | 7 | H/LE | Limited Edition "Virgin" Art Edition Variant Cover | Arthur Suydam | 8 | I/LE | Limited Edition "Virgin" Art Edition Variant Cover | Stuart Sayger | 9 | J/FOC | 1:7 FOC Incentive Variant Cover | Ken Haeser (a), Buz Hasson (a) & Blair Smith (c) | 10 | K/FOC | 1:11 FOC Incentive "Black & White" Art Edition Variant Cover | Ken Haeser | 11 | L/FOC | 1:15 FOC Incentive "Black & White" Art Edition Variant Cover | Rodney Buchemi | 12 | M/FOC | 1:21 FOC Incentive "Black & White" Art Edition Variant Cover | Rodney Buchemi | 13 | N/FOC | 1:25 FOC Incentive "Tinted" Art Edition Variant Cover | Rodney Buchemi | 14 |
